'''Bobby Flynn''' is the son of [[Henry Flynn]].

==History==
When his father was internally decapitated in a car accident, Bobby and his sister, Tina, came to the ER with their mother. Their mom instructed them to tell their father they love him and wish him good luck on his surgery.

After his surgery, his family was able to go into his room and see him.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
His father was seriously injured in a car accident. When that happened, he, his mom, and his sister came to the hospital to be with him.
